version_description:
1.The configuration page of device has been optimized.
2.Manual has been added in the “Settings”.
3.Searching device function has been added(Make sure at least one device has been connected successfully before using this function)
4.Help center has been added, you can query questions ,or give us feedback.

1.The configuration page of device has been optimized.
2.Manual has been added in the “Settings”.
3.Searching device function has been added(Make sure at least one device has been connected successfully before using this function)
4.Help center has been added, you can query questions ,or give us feedback.
Version update.
Version update.
Version update.
Version update.

1. Optimized the Smart Settings interface interaction.
2. Optimized the Device Group interface interaction.

1. Optimized the Smart Settings interface interaction.
2. Optimized the Device Group interface interaction.

1. Optimized authorization steps of Alexa
2. Fixed some issues

1. Optimized authorization steps of Alexa
2. Fixed some issues
1.Regular updates.
1.Regular updates.

1. The mobile phone SMS registration feature has been deleted. Old users who have previously registered using their mobile phones can still use the app normally.
2. Add the "Automation-Logs" feature: Tap "Logs" to view up to 7 days of automated scene logs.
3. App name has been changed from LE LampUX to Lepro LampUX.

1. The mobile phone SMS registration feature has been deleted. Old users who have previously registered using their mobile phones can still use the app normally.
2. Add the "Automation-Logs" feature: Tap "Logs" to view up to 7 days of automated scene logs.
3. App name has been changed from LE LampUX to Lepro LampUX.

1. Optimized the authorization process for Google Assistant
2. Optimized the network pairing feature of WiFi + Bluetooth dual-mode products
3. Optimized the user interface experience for manual network pairing

1. Optimized the authorization process for Google Assistant
2. Optimized the network pairing feature of WiFi + Bluetooth dual-mode products
3. Optimized the user interface experience for manual network pairing

APP update content:
1. OTA automatic update function added: Users can choose to have the device update the firmware automatically and the device will complete the update during inactive hours.
2. Under Account and Security, users can change the bound email and mobile phone number and then log in with changed info.

APP update content:
1. OTA automatic update function added: Users can choose to have the device update the firmware automatically and the device will complete the update during inactive hours.
2. Under Account and Security, users can change the bound email and mobile phone number and then log in with changed info.

1. Added operation tips for the first use.
2. Support multiple devices pairing at the same time.

1. Added operation tips for the first use.
2. Support multiple devices pairing at the same time.

1. Optimized Smart Automation experience: added sample instructions on the Create Smart page to help users to understand the Automation functions
2. Support Beacon Bluetooth device connection

1. Optimized Smart Automation experience: added sample instructions on the Create Smart page to help users to understand the Automation functions
2. Support Beacon Bluetooth device connection
